product_name: Red Label Tea Leaf, 1kg: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: Received different Quality then what I ordered.
reviews.review_body: I had ordered Red Label 1kg pack which shows  "Tasty & Healthy - Healthy Flavonoids" written on packing as it also includes small tea leaves in it. But I received packing of "Taste of Togetherness" which have simple tea only.
Taste is so good and superior quality!!! Worth every penny of it !!! Thanks to Amazon for the discount!!

reviews.review_title: definitely this very good product. If you are getting it at around ...
reviews.review_body: I dont think i need to tell much about Brooke Bond, definitely this very good product. If you are getting it at around 310INR that's great.

reviews.review_title: Mfg. date is one year ago and exp. ...
reviews.review_body: Mfg. date is one year ago and exp. date is almost near. How can i use 1kg within couple of month? Again it is non returnable

reviews.review_title: We were not happy with the product
reviews.review_body: It was different... It's a leaf tea but there were no leafs in the tea. We were not happy with the product. The small packs got leaves in the tea powder. Not happy..
I am having this tea from past 5 years, this is still taste and smells the same. Got a heavy discount from Amazon, very happy!!
This is really very good tea.Even drinking good for health twice a day.Taste is something different than any ther tea available in the market.

reviews.review_title: Issue with MRP of product! Quality over all is good
reviews.review_body: MRP on product actually is INR 350 and not 430.

reviews.review_title: Einer der besten Tees aus Indien
reviews.review_body: Seit einigen Jahren ist diese Teesorte aus Indien in Österreich nicht mehr erhältlich.Dank Amazon Marketplace ist es gelungen einen deutschen Händler zu finden der diese Spezialität liefert.Ab sofort steht dem Teegenuß nichts mehr im Wege.
